# [Interview #60: East of the Sun Con - Karl-Johan Norén, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=60#9)

#### Robert Jordan

The Nine Rings Inn in
*The Great Hunt*
he readily confessed was a homage to our favorite professor—J.R.R. Tolkien.
